title: Twists
description:
Jamie Brickhouse, Hilary Sigismondi, Linda Smith and Maryam Zaringhalam share stories about sex club surprises, pathological lying, adult toy shopping, and near death experiences.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Errol Garner, The Clovers, Hilary Sigismondi, Linda Smith, C***, Tennis, Lenny Kravitz, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Maryam Zaringhalam, Jamie Brickhouse)
